e="preserve">David Poole Anderson (May 6, 1929 – October 4, 2018) was an American sportswriter. He was born in Troy, New York. In 1981 he won a Pulitzer Prize for commentary on sporting events. He was the author of 21 books and more than 350 magazine articles.
Anderson died on October 4, 2018 at the age of 89 in Cresskill, New Jersey from heart failure.
